data.name: Just Perfect
data.detailed_description:
Just Perfect is a fun and quirky 1st person collaborative multiplayer game where you work together with your partner to best you neighbours in a strategic and hectic race towards the local neighbourhood's renowned award “JUST PERFECT”.

In Just Perfect, each team starts with their own house in a classic 1950 small suburban area. Make a plan with your partner; Build, Upgrade and Vandalize your way to victory. Afterall, no one says your house actually has to be perfect. It just has to be better than the others!


Choose among a selection of charismatic neighbourhood locals, play as Doreen, the “friendly" old lady who used to be a boxer, or the strong Chad, who loves baking more than anything. Each character comes with their own personal traits and skills. You'll need to balance and coordinate your skillset with your partner in order to come out on top. Over time you'll be able to add more characters and customise each of them with new outfits.


First item on the agenda is to maintain your house. Clean with the broom, paint your rooms and put items back on their shelves. The more perfect your house the higher the income. The higher the income the merrier the shopping!


Make sure to spend your time and budget wisely in order to get the best de-fence. Whether you make tin can tripwires and falling bucket traps on your workbench or orders high tech safety systems over the phone, you can be sure they will come in handy once your neighbors forgets to knock first. Or simply nudge that foe into the BBQ and look away for a while.


Once your own house is all tidied up and well defended it is time to turn your attention to your nieghbors! Upgrade, build and buy equipment that lets you vandalize your neighbors houses. Catapults, potato guns, termites, rats are only a few of the tricks you can pull off. And if all else fails make use of unlimited ways to throw and sabotage them with the physicalized items.

data.short_description: Just Perfect is a fun and quirky 1st person collaborative multiplayer game where you work together with your partner to best you neighbours in a strategic and hectic race towards the local neighbourhood's renowned award “JUST PERFECT”.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 280X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Headphones
